alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 25 at 2:37AM EST until December 26 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. * WHERE...Coffee, Jeff Davis, Bacon, Appling and Atkinson Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis
